Title: Relates to expenses and the extension of repayment of inter-fund advances related to state disaster emergency declared pursuant to executive order 202 of 2020
Summary: Relates to expenses related to the state disaster emergency declared pursuant to executive order 202 of 2020; authorizes the extension of repayment of inter-fund advances made for expenses related to the state disaster emergency declared pursuant to executive order 202 of 2020.
LawCode: Amd Title, §§2-4, Chap of 2020 (as proposed in S. 8417 & A. 10492)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend a chapter of the laws of 2020 amending the local finance law relating to bond anticipation notes issued in calendar years 2015 through 2021, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 8417 and A. 10492, in relation to expenditures and temporary transfer of reserve funds for expenses related to state disaster emergency declared pursuant to executive order 202 of 2020 and authorizing the extension of repayment of inter-fund advances made for expenses related to state disaster emergency declared pursuant to executive order 202 of 2020
